title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 20.2 - Notification of procedures to be followed by private counsel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 20.2 - Notification of procedures to be followed by private counsel

State Regulations

Upon receipt of notification of retention, the State

Comptroller shall transmit to retained private counsel a copy of this
regulation and a sample payment voucher in the form prescribed by the State

Comptroller. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
20.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
